[h: sides = listGet( dice, 1, "d" )] [h: number = listGet( dice, 0, "d" )] [h, if(number==""): number=0] [h, count( number ): pool = listAppend(pool, "1d"+sides)] [r: pool]

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[h: id = json.get(macro.args, "id")] [h: pool = getProperty("selectedDice", id)] [h: reserved = getProperty("reservedDice",id)] [h: seeValue = totalOfPool(listAppend(pool, reserved))] [h: raiseValue = getLibProperty("lastRaise", "Lib:DitV")] [r, if( seeValueSee ([r:seeValue]) of [r:getName(id)] does not meet the Raise ([r:raiseValue]) [r, if(getLibProperty("lastRaiser", "Lib:DitV")!=""): "of "+ getName(getLibProperty("lastRaiser", "Lib:DitV"))+"."] }; { [h, if( listCount(reserved)>0 ), code: { [h: pool = listAppend(pool, reserved)] [h: setProperty("reservedDice", "", id)] };{}] [h: assert( listCount(pool)>0, "You cant see without dice!", 0)] [r, if( listCount(pool)==1 ), code: { [h: setProperty("reservedDice", pool, id)] };{}] [h, if( listCount(pool)>2 ), code: { [h: fo = getProperty("falloutCount", id)] [h, if( isNumber(fo)==0): fo = 0] [h: fo = fo + listCount(pool)] [h: setProperty("falloutCount", fo, id)] [h: setState("hasFallout", 1, id)] [h: msg = "
"+getName(id)+" took "+listCount(pool)+" fallout dice."] };{ [h: msg = "" ]}] [r:showPool(pool, 0,40)]
[r: getName(id)] sees with [r:listCount(pool)+if(listCount(pool)==1," die"," dice")] a total of [r: totalOfPool(pool)]: [r:whatAction(id)][r:msg] [h: setProperty("selectedDice", "", id)] [r:openFrame(id)] }]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: see

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[h: ids = macro.args] [r, foreach(id, ids, "
"), code:{ [r:getName(id)]:
[h: pool = getProperty("myPool",id)] [h: rolledPool = listSort(rollPool(pool), "N-")] [h: setProperty("rolledPool", rolledPool, id)] [h: setProperty("selectedDice", "", id)] [h: setProperty("reservedDice", "", id)] [r: showPool(rolledPool,1,40)]
[h: openFrame(id)] }]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: rollPools

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[h: id = macro.args] [h: fo = getProperty("falloutCount", id)] [h, if( isNumber(fo)==0 ): fo=0] [h: assert(fo>0, getName(id)+" has no fallout!",0)] [h: diceList = "d4,d6,d8,d10"] [h: diceImgList = ""] [h, for(i, 0, listCount(diceList) ): diceImgList = listAppend(diceImgList, tableImage("DiceImages",i+1))] [h: status = input("size|"+diceImgList+"|Select fallout dice|LIST|SELECT=0 ICON=TRUE ICONSIZE=50")] [h: abort(status)] [h: size = listGet(diceList, size)] [h: fod = fo+size] [h: fop = wellformedPool(fod)] [h: fop = rollPool(fop)] Fallout:
[r: showPool(fop,1,40)] [h: foValue = highestRoll(fop)] [h: hasOne = 0] [h, foreach( die, fop ), code: { [h, if( listGet(die, 0, "/") == "1" ): hasOne=1] }] [r, if( foValue <= 7 ), code: { Choose something from the short term fallout list. [r, macro("shortTermTable@Lib:DitV"):""] };{}] [r, if( foValue >= 8 && foValue <=11 ), code: { Youre character is injured. Choose something from the long term fallout list. [r, macro("longTermTable@Lib:DitV"):""] };{}] [r, if( foValue >= 12 ), code: { Youre character is badly injured.
Choose two things from the long term fallout list. [r, macro("longTermTable@Lib:DitV"):""] };{}] [r, if( foValue >= 12 && foValue <= 15 ), code: {
You need medical attention. Roll your body.
Can you see the two highest dice in this fallout roll with 3 or less dice?
If not: you will die without medical attention. };{}] [r, if( foValue >= 16 && foValue <= 19 ), code: {
You will die without medical attention. };{}] [r, if( foValue > 19), code: {
Sorry pal,youre dying. };{}] [r, if( hasOne ), code:{
You rolled a 1. Choose something from the experience fallout list. [r, macro("experienceTable@Lib:DitV"):""] };{}] [h: setProperty("falloutCount", 0, id)] [h: setState("hasFallout", 0, id)]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: rollFallout
addPCsToInitiative

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[h: id = macro.args]
[h: switchToken(id)] [h: pool = getProperty("rolledPool",id)] [h: init = strformat("%03d.%03d", highestRoll(pool), totalOfPool(pool))] [h: addToInitiative()] [h: setInitiative(init)] [h: sortInitiative()]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: addTokenToInitiative
CSS

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[dialog("Experience Fallout"): {
Experience Fallout
Add 1 to one of your stats.
Add or subtract 1 die from an existing trait.
Change the d-size of an existing trait.
Add or subtract 1 die from an existing relationship.
Change the d-size of an existing relationship.
Write a belonging on your character sheet and give it its usual dice.
}]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: experienceTable

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[dialog("Long Term Fallout"): {
Long Term Fallout
Subtract 1 from one of your characters stats.
Take a new trait rated 1d4.
Take a new relationship rated 1d4.
Add 1d to an existing d4 trait or relationship.
Subtract 1d from an existing d6+ trait or relationship.
Change the die size of an existing trait or relationship to d4.
Erase a belonging from your characters sheet.
Rewrite your coats description to include permanent damage. Reduce your coats dice if its called for.
}]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: longTermTable

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[dialog("Short Term Fallout"): {
Short Term Fallout
Subtract 1 from one of your characters stats for your next conflict.
Take a new trait rated 1d4 for your next conflict
Change the dice of one of your characters relationships to d4s for your next conflict.
Have your character leave the scene and spend some time alone.
}]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: shortTermTable

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h: id = macro.args] [h: jsonCS = jsonCharacterSheet()] [h: setProperty("characterSheet", jsonCS, id)]

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h: stats = json.set("", "Acuity", "2d6", "Body", "2d6", "Heart", "2d6", "Will", "2d6")] [h: rels = json.set("", "Blood", "1d6")] [h: bels = json.set("", "Coat", "1d6")] [h: jsonCS = json.set("", "Stats", stats, "Traits", "{}", "Relationships", rels, "Belongings", bels)] [r: jsonCS]

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[h: id = macro.args] [h: showEdit = getProperty("showEdit", id)] [h: showEdit = if(showEdit == 1, 1, 0)] [h: jsonCS = getProperty("characterSheet", id)] [h: keys1 = json.fields(jsonCS)] [r, foreach(key1, keys1,""), code: { [h: cls = "odd"] [h: json = json.get(jsonCS, key1)] [h: keys2 = json.fields(json)] [r, foreach(key2, keys2,""), code: { [h: args = json.set("", "id", id, "cat", key1, "name", key2, "dice", json.get(json, key2))] [h: cls = if(cls=="odd", "even", "odd")] }] }]
[r:getName(id)]
[r:key1] [r, if(showEdit):macroLink("add", "addDiceDlg@Lib:DitV", "none", json.set("", "id", id, "cat", key1), id)]
[r:decode(key2)] [r:json.get(json, key2)] [r,if(showEdit):macroLink("edit", "editDice@Lib:DitV", "none", args, id)] [r,if(showEdit):macroLink("delete", "deleteDice@Lib:DitV", "none", args, id)] [r:macroLink("use", "addDiceToPool@lib:DitV", "all", args, id)]
[r:macroLink(if(showEdit==1, "Hide edit buttons", "Show edit buttons"), "switchEditButtons@Lib:DitV", "none", args, id)]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: csEditor

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h: id = json.get(macro.args, "id")] [h: cat = json.get(macro.args, "cat")] [h: name = json.get(macro.args, "name")] [h: dice = json.get(macro.args, "dice")] [r:getName(id)] added [r:decode(name)] ([r:dice]) to its pool: [h: rolledPool = getProperty("rolledPool",id)] [h: newPool = rollPool(dice)] [r: showPool( newPool, 0, 30)] [h: rolledPool = listSort(listAppend(rolledPool, newPool), "N-")] [h: setProperty("rolledPool", rolledPool, id)] [h: openFrame(id)]

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[h: id = json.get(macro.args, "id")] [h: cat = json.get(macro.args, "cat")] [h: name = json.get(macro.args, "name")] [h: dice = json.get(macro.args, "dice")]
[h: jsonCS = getProperty("characterSheet", id)] [h: fields = json.fields(jsonCS)] [h: index = listFind(fields, cat)] [h: status = input("cat|"+fields+"|Category?|LIST|VALUE=STRING SELECT="+index, "name|"+decode(name)+"|Description|TEXT", "dice|"+dice+"|Dice|TEXT")] [h: abort(status)]
[h, macro("addDiceToToken@Lib:DitV"):json.set("", "id", id, "cat", cat, "name", encode(name), "dice", dice)] [h: openEditor( id )]

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h: id = json.get(macro.args, "id")] [h: cat = json.get(macro.args, "cat")] [h: name = json.get(macro.args, "name")] [h: dice = json.get(macro.args, "dice")] [h: jsonCS = getProperty("characterSheet", id)] [h: json = json.get(jsonCS, cat)] [h: json = json.set(json, name, dice)] [h: jsonCS = json.set(jsonCS, cat, json)] [h: setProperty("characterSheet", jsonCS, id)]

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[h: id = json.get(macro.args, "id")] [h: cat = json.get(macro.args, "cat")]
[h: jsonCS = getProperty("characterSheet", id)] [h: fields = json.fields(jsonCS)] [h, if(cat==""): index=1; index=listFind(fields, cat)] [h: status = input("cat|"+fields+"|Category?|LIST|VALUE=STRING SELECT="+index, "name|description|Description|TEXT", "dice|1d6|Dice|TEXT")] [h: abort(status)]
[h, macro("addDiceToToken@Lib:DitV"): json.set("", "id", id, "cat", cat, "name", encode(name), "dice", dice)] [h: openEditor(id)]

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[h: id = json.get(macro.args, "id")] [h: cat = json.get(macro.args, "cat")] [h: name = json.get(macro.args, "name")] [h: dice = json.get(macro.args, "dice")]
[h: jsonCS = getProperty("characterSheet", id)]
[h: msg = strformat("This will remove '%s'! Are you sure?", decode(name))] [h: status = input("dummy|"+msg+"||LABEL|SPAN=TRUE")] [h: abort(status)]
[h: json = json.get(jsonCS, cat)] [h: json = json.remove(json, name)] [h: jsonCS = json.set(jsonCS, cat, json)] [h: setProperty("characterSheet", jsonCS, id)]
[h: openEditor( id )]
